description.author: Jon Schoning
description.synopsis: Espial is an open-source, web-based bookmarking server.
description.description:
Espial is an open-source, web-based bookmarking server.
- Yesod + PureScript + sqlite3
- multi-user (w/ privacy scopes)
- tags, stars, editing, deleting

package-flags.name: dev
package-flags.description: Turn on development settings, like auto-reload templates.
